website_summaries.verdict: These bamboo sunglasses protect your eyes against UV rays with double UV blocking coating and nine layers of polarization.
pros: Nine-layer polarized lenses with double UV blocking coating and polarizing film
Includes bamboo case, microfiber pouch, and cleaning cloth
cons: May run a bit small for larger men

customer_reviews.title: I recently bought beautiful Cloufield's wooden sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought beautiful Cloufield's wooden sunglasses, which exceeded all expectations and are even more beautiful and stylish in reality than in pictures. Unfortunately, the lovely bamboo box that is supposed to carry and protect the glasses, came cracked. I immediately turned to the company's customer service, and a super nice customer service representative named Rachel made sure to replace the product quickly, efficiently, and super nicely, and made sure to be in touch until the reception. In conclusion, I bought a wonderful product and got a great service experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Frames are cheap plastic and hinges are not are not well spring loaded but I will say the wood burned art is cool. Would not recommend for the price at best these are worth $10 or less and I would not trust Cloudfield products.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L

customer_reviews.title: Great sales pitch
customer_reviews.text: Great sales pitch, wonderful customer service, crappy product unfortunately. Lens quality is subpar - horrible glare on the inside of the glasses makes these shades very uncomfortable to wear. You constantly see reflection of your eyeballs in the lense.
customer_reviews.author: antonsalex

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! They fit me and my boyfriend perfectly! Stylish and trend as well as unisex. They’re polarized and perfect fo adventures! They are also very light weight and float in water. I definitely recommend these Cloudfield sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Newton

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sunglasses! I owned a similar pair that I bought in South Africa (which were unfortunately crushed by my sons). In comparison, these sunglasses from Cloudfield are more substantial and less likely to get crushed! I like the color and particularly the color of the polarized lenses. I have worn them in bright sun and for driving and have been pleased with the quality of the lenses. I paid almost double the price for the glasses I bought in Cape Town for about half the quality of these sunglasses. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Furr

customer_reviews.title: These broke at the slightest touch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who had his previous pair of sunglasses (that cost $12) for over two years. Within 2 weeks these had a crack in them. We bought wood glue to fix them and then a month later another crack showed up and the glue eventually stopped holding the first crack together. Do not buy these if you expect them to hold up. He did not misuse them in any way. They break very unexpectedly. For the price, you would expect them to hold up longer than a few weeks. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: OK sunglasses, can’t use wood case to store them
customer_reviews.text: Wood case the sunglasses come in cannot be used to store the sunglasses. There is wood dust on the inside of the case that gets on the microfiber pouch that the sunglasses are in so if you then use the microfiber to clean the glasses you’ll scratch the lenses. I tried cleaning the inside of the wood case but wood dust still got on the microfiber a second time. I threw the microfiber ouch and cloth in the garbage because I could not be certain there was no wood dust remaining after I cleaned them. Sunglasses are fine, not great. They seem a little too narrow but that may just be me.
customer_reviews.author: ajfjc

customer_reviews.title: Very unique and cool looking shades
customer_reviews.text: Very unique and cool looking shades, the downfall is that they are poorly made, after one full day of use the arm completely broke off, maybe I just got the bad luck on them but very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wood like
customer_reviews.text: the product looks great, but looking in more details into it, this looks like plastic. the material used is not like the previous wooden sunglasses i've used. If you look around the lenses you'll see the fade of the plastic. I've owned wooden sunglasses before, and they were made of bamboo. They do not look, feel like this. They had a true wood feel and touch.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer/IT Expert

customer_reviews.title: These would have been so great if were not cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These would have been so great if were not cheaply made. One of the temples is crooked it is facing too much inward causing the glasses to sit crooked when wearing. For some reason customer service could not understand what that means. Also one temples is a darker wood shade than the other. Besides that they are great if only were not defective. Asked to have them replaced instead they told me to return them.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are so light, I'm actually a little afraid of breaking them. I've worn them a few times now and have no real complaints, though. The view through the lenses is surprisingly vibrant compared to other, less expensive sunglasses I've owned (and some more expensive pairs, as well). My pair are ever so slightly off-center, but considering they are handmade, it's a minor gripe. After wearing them for 5 minutes I don't realize it. Plus, they're quite different than anything else I've owned. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DanS145

customer_reviews.title: Decent sunglasses as long as they're for women or small headed men
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and they are so SMALL they look awful on him. They do "expand" to technically fit him but the frames are just so tiny they're almost comical. Hes a large man but average size large man (not fat at all lol so idk how these are supposed to fit any other full grown man) bc they didn't meet my purpose for them I cant give them more stars. HOWEVER they seem decent quality, a tad more see through than I would've liked. They're good for small womens faces though, they aren't a good color on me though so I will be regifting them. Not a bad price though so could be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JC92

customer_reviews.title: He wears them daily and I like that they are polarized for his eyes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and he loves them, gets compliments on them all the time. They are wider/looser than other sunglasses I have tried, as they are adjustable for different head shapes.He also mentioned being a slight glare but its not enough for him to choose another pair. He wears them daily and I like that they are polarized for his eyes.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about these glasses, especially given the price. I'm one of those people who constantly misplaces things and have had my heart broken a few times over $200+ sunglasses left in bars. These have a look and feel similar to the Ray Ban Wayfarer, are reasonably well made, and a great value for the money, especially given that they are polarized. I also love that they fit my oversized melon of a head. After a few weeks of regular wear, they're still tight with the lens treatment intact.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A. Soukup

customer_reviews.title: 100% would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiance because he's been wanting a particular tint and other sunglasses haven't meant his standard. These were exactly what he was looking for. The picture doesn't do it justice. They really enhance the colors when out in nature while providing great protection from the sun. He also loves that the frame is made from wood since it's so unique from what you normally see. We have very different face shapes / sizes and the sunglasses fit both of us well. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wooden Sunglasses w/ UV Protection
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first pair of sunglasses with rose gold lenses. I received many compliments from friends and even from strangers when out and about. I went to Ireland recently and ended up trashing them by accident, so, as soon as I got home, I ordered the same pair of sunglasses, and they arrived the next day. Same quality, same look and same fit, which is extremely lightweight and comfortable. I'd highly recommend these sunglasses to anyone whose looking for a quality pair of shades with a unique twist to them i.e. made from wood and rose gold lenses!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: They float, are stylish, and cool! - UPDATE: No Float :(
customer_reviews.text: Who hasn't lost a pair of Oakleys, Vuarnets, Maui's in the lake?? I just got these but they seem very quality. I had different wood glasses, I use for surfing. I got some water on the diff ones, and they like burned the finish off the lenses...garbage. SO, I am really hoping these don't do the same. They have a nice bonus for you too. I'll keep you posted. If they are good, I will highly recommend to fellow surfers and watersports peeps! THEY DONT FLOAT! SERIOUSLY DISAPPOINTED. THEY ARE STYLISH AND NICE, BUT DONT FLOAT!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Value and Style!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shades! Great value. The weight and style are awesome. I bought the polarized lenses and the dark wood mostly for driving and boating. I bought the other wood pair in light woood with Blue polarized lenses from another Amazon seller for my partner. They look good but not quite the feel and they fit larger and did not come with the sharp case as the CloudField. Will definitely but CloudField sunglasses again. They are great and price is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They float- but are made for big faces
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging, pretty solid frame, they felt sturdy and survived a drop (oops). However, these frames were just too big for my face. They made me look like a child and felt slightly too loose (ie- if I looked down they would shift slightly). If you're a woman with a large face/head or a man then these would probably be a better fit. Also, the lenses are quite dark. A note on the floating advertisement: I tested these in the sink and they did float slightly, however, I don't think they would stay on the surface if there are waves/wind and their dark color would make them extremely hard to find in most lakes.
customer_reviews.author: KMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fashionable, loose-fitting
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever pair of wooden sunglasses. I am extremely picky in selecting sunglasses, so I was weary of ordering these online. They are a beautiful color and arrived in a nice wooden carry case. The glasses are lightweight and block the sun’s rays enough for my sensitive eyes. My only complaints are that they are loose-fitting and the nosepiece isn’t large enough for the bridge of my nose, so they fall down. The lid for the carrying case was loose, as well. I had to add a few strips of tape around the lid’s rim to secure the lid well enough to store in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton J.

customer_reviews.title: Glass rims are very visible from the corners of my eye...
customer_reviews.text: RECOMMENDED: These sunglasses are good. I was going to buy a famous brand's sunglasses for 250.00 but thought better of it and took a chance of these. The fit it very good...wooden frames are comfortable and somewhat unique. Packaging was very classy. The lenses are clear and not too dark- just right for a sunny day. I have no affiliation with the seller and would buy again should the need arise (I loose my sunglasses at least once a year- lol ).
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sisto

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the style but it really blocks the sun well
customer_reviews.text: This product feels like an authentic wood quality and fits perfectly. Like I said, I bought them for style but they keep the sun out of my eyes as good as any ray bans or Oakleys I have. I am impressed that these are handmade but I'm not a fan of it conveying that message inside one of the sunglasses arms (so its not visible). I recommend if you can't afford designer brands but are looking for the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Way too big!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing good about these is the polarized lenses. They are huge! Way too big for the face unless you have big cheeks. The case was busted upon arrival. Just overall a bad experience. I'll keep them for a backup pair if I just have to have something over my eyes, but definitely not happy with them. UPDATE: After writing this review I was contacted from their support team. They offered me a full refund and made sure I was satisfied. Even the glasses did not suit my face, I'm very happy with the company's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Was hard to find wooden sunglasses for smaller face, but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I finally found some for a smaller face but these are slightly too small for me. Probably the right fit for most looking for that though. Fit is close enough they look better than all the over-sized options would. Quality and durability seems like it will be about what you'd expect for the price range. I need a 2nd pair of sunglasses but will probably use these measurements and go with something just slightly larger, but I wouldn't complain about a 2nd pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: River Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small for my adult head
customer_reviews.text: The right lens is a little loose, and these are a little small for me. I probably should have realized that before I purchased them, but I didn't. I wear a 7.75 sized baseball cap, so my head is big. I appreciate the springs, but even still these glasses pinch behind my ears and give me a headache when I wear them to cover my eyes. They do work well as a headband to hold my hair out of my face, but they're kind of expensive to play that role.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice but need more sizing options.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are made of wood which is great but the frame is kinda bulky. I have to remove them or strain to see around them when driving and needing to see the blind spot or for lane changes. In that moment it becomes very obvious you're wearing them. Also, the frame is kinda big I wish they were more fitted. I can't push them up to rest on my head when I need because they just fall off. I have to hold both sides of the frame to put them on or they miss going over one ear every time. Its a little thing but quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyred1101

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful glasses, just darker tint if possible and even them out/balance them
customer_reviews.text: Could be a few shades darker, I don't like people being able to see my eyes especially if I'm tired or had a long night to ask a stupid question if they know me. I like the wood texture and look so a darker tint would've been wonderful. Also balance them too please bcause they felt uneven to me on my ears slightly but enough that I could notice and when I asked someone they could tell a little as well but otherwise they were fine if you didn't look too hard
customer_reviews.author: Tremoni

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses, but not sure if they are worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's really nifty that they are made of wood. Fact is that it's hard to make durable glasses out of wood. It's just not as strong a material as plastic. It does not flex in the same way. That being the case, these are not as durable as an equivalent pair of plastic shades. And they are more expensive. If you are not rough with your shades, then they will be fine. The lenses seem to withstand scratches well, it's the frames that are the weak part of these.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun O.

customer_reviews.title: I personally like Ray-Ban wayfers
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have used many name brand sunglasses. I personally like Ray-Ban wayfers, and aviators. I thought I would give these glasses a try for a couple of reasons, First, the were made with wooden frames. Next, they looked stylish and finally they were cheap. When they arrived a few days later, I was greatly surprised by the build quality and value. These SHOULD cost $50-$80 but what a value. My 18 year old daughter is wearing them now and LOVES the glasses. Great filters, nice design, cool style, and very lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Bays

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo case cracked!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a large bubble wrap envelope. No stickers saying “fragile” or “ handle with care.” Opened up to see the item and wooden case is crack. Product is light in terms of weight, since frame is made of bamboo material. I “wood” have given this product a 3 or 4 star but case arrived cracked, indicating the frame of this shade could be fragile! Plus, center piece of shade doesn’t properly sit on bridge of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Product fit, form, & function

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE The seller contacted me and shipped a replacement unit overnight. Great customer service and the new glasses look great. I would recommend them just for the customer service, however they do seem more fragile than sunglasses from other materials and may be prone to breaking. I hope these ones last longer as I do love the look of them. ORIGINAL REVIEW Liked the look of the product but they broke after the second day. Had them in my pocket in the protective bag and the arm just broke. Did not realize until I was putting them on and got a splinter in my face. Would not recommend these as not durable but they do look great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Durable, elegant, finely crafted
customer_reviews.text: I had some bamboo sunglasses that just broke on me the other day. The frame part where it holds the lens wasn’t good enough. Saw these and went out on a limb. Glad I did. These sunglasses are not only durable but they definitely protect your eyes. The polarized lens they provide are no joke. It’s the real deal. Wood is finely cut. Even the case is super elegant. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Dmayzing

customer_reviews.title: A different type of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. Let's just say they're sunglasses in a nice bamboo cylinder container...and they appear to be hand carved. I don't know anything about the UV protection since no info is available, but you're able to see nicely. The weight feels weird, but it's just different. The jury is still out on whether I "like" them.
customer_reviews.author: Diamondhog

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about it, just purchase them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. I was looking around for a solid wooden pair of glasses for a few months, and finally settled on these ones. I was super glad I did. But about 8 months after having them, I noticed that one side of glasses was wobbly. It turned out their was a small crack. I messaged customer service, and Rachel offered to send a new pair. Thank you! You can’t beat a company that values their customers. I will buy my glasses from here from now on. Thanks Cloudfield!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: Mine glasses arrived with scratches in the wood frame, when I wear them for the first time the was a crack on the one leg but it didn't broke so far. Sun protection is so so and the view is blueish in my lenses. My head is small and nose is average, but they leave marks on my nose and tight behind the ears. My previous bamboo glasses (the same price category) were way better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frames crack after two months, but seller will replace!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these adorable glasses have fragile frames. After just two months, the frames have cracked and the right lens popped out. So disappointing. I loved these so much and the darling case they came in, too! But after I contacted the seller, I received a lovely email from Rachel, and since they guarantee these for a year from purchase, I'm delighted to say I'm receiving a replacement pair. This is clearly a company that cares.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Shades For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are so close to being perfect. This is my second pair because unfortunately i lost the first pair when i moved. The only reason i don't give them 5 stars is because there is a bit of a mean glare when the sun is at your back. Other than that these glasses are super comfortable and look great. Honestly they make perfect beach glasses due to the fact that they float so you won't have to worry about losing them in the surf. Love Cloudfield and will defintiely be ordering another pair in the future! Absolutely can't beat these for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Nioce!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! Light & perfect fit! Shipped quickly and love that they came with a hard case and a soft bag to protect them! Only negative thing I can say is that when wearing them and looking at my phone (or any device with a screen)... it's hard to read because of the film on the glasses! It makes it all rainbow like.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades. The wood is actual wood unlike some others I've bought online, and you can feel the difference when you wear them. Not to mention they look great with just about all my wardrobe and I've gotten several compliments already, but the lenses themselves make my constant Cloud gazing and sunset chasing all the more fun. There's something about brown lenses, you've just got to see it. On top of all that, the price is very decent, and the shades ship in a little wooden cylinder so you know they made it safe. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: sleepdeprived514

customer_reviews.title: Fit my small head well
customer_reviews.text: I have so many sunglasses and many of them get easily scraped or slip off my face when I’m gardening or mountain biking. These fit my small head really well and are lightweight on my nose. I also love that the nose pad that touches my skin is smooth and doesn’t cause abrasion on my skin when I sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: 😞
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but reflection is strong. Customer service sucked! They dooped me into giving a good initial review with promise of free glasses. I followed intructions. Then they needed ot submitted a mew way with a screen shot and never allowed me a portal to upload where origianally they wanted a link... Huge waste of my time "Rachel". Overal they were decent glasses but reflection super annoying and customer service terrible. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: George P Simonds

customer_reviews.title: Fortune cookies are rarely fortunes but these glasses are the genuine article.
customer_reviews.text: Very unique, nice-looking, high quality sunglasses. Lenses have wonderful clarity and are great for driving. Easily comparable to much more expensive glasses I’ve owned (and lost). Company seems wonderful, and cares about customers and satisfaction. If you’re reading this because you’re considering buying, just buy them. Do it. Do it now. Stop thinking about it. Only the bold reap the rewards. I read that in a fortune cookie recently which isn’t really a fortune as much as an observation but it seems apropos here. So do as my fortune cookie observes and buy them. You’re welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Alphonso Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: Great look, size, price...
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses have it all UV protection, Polarization and reflective lenses, which many other big brand names with BIG costs don't have. These sunglasses also have a great fit with the 51mm size lenses. This was my third pair of glasses purchased on Amazon and I had to return the others due to fit, as they all had really large lenses (bug eyes). These Cloudfield Bamboo Wooden Sunglasses have a great classic look at a great cost and provide the UV protection we all need. Oh yea one last thing since these glasses are wooden they float, can't tell you how many glasses I have lost in the ocean and lake, so they got that going for them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, High-Quality, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a reasonably-priced, stylish pair of sunglasses, I found the Bamboo Wooden Wayfarer Style to be the ideal pair for my price range. Attention to detail and craftsmanship typically come with a higher price tag, but this pair of sunglasses doesn't have the name brand markup found in other shades that start around $100. Very pleased so far with this pair as comfortable driving sunglasses. The flexible arms and lightweight frame help me avoid a headache or temple pressure that I've experienced with other sunglasses in the past. I appreciate the company's attention to detail and the bamboo cylindrical case that comes with it--Nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great 5th Year (Wood) Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband is impossible to shop for, but he lost his prescription glasses in March and has been too lazy to get a new pair. Although these are not prescription, I thought they’d make the perfect 5th year anniversary gift for him. They look great and work great so far. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Lenses are more teal than they are blue
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A little bit different than the actual picture shows, I suppose they all vary slightly. The frames are lighter than the pics and the lenses are more teal than blue. I think I'll give them to my wife or return them. The self eye reflection is kind of annoying, not used to that. They did come in good condition but not exactly what I was looking and hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Narramore

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality and value for a fantastic pair of beautiful polarized mirrored sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are already my favorite sunglasses because as you see they are beautiful and polarized and mirrored, all the things I look for when I buy Costas and Smiths and b.n.u.s sunglasses. Can you believe $29.99 for these and they are real wood. Perfect fit too. They look great as well. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Great twist on a classic design. Solid clarity/polarization, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking with a great fit. The workmanship appears to be pretty solid, and the clarity with the polarized lenses is very good for the price. Was looking for new pair of wayfarers with a little bit of a twist, and these filled that need nicely. Definitely recommend for smaller and average head sizes. While the mild, comfortable flex/tension in the hinges helps keep them on your face when in motion, guys with truly gigantic melons might do better to shop other models.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice lenses, weak frames.
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, love the polarization, but the wood is very weak, I dropped them 2 days after getting them to garage floor from a few feet and the frame cracked! :-( Also, internal reflections are bad at times, and the frames were too small for my head. I still wear them though!
customer_reviews.author: MichaelVanGo!

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard for me to find sunglasses that fit and are comfortable (not sure why, I must have a funny shaped face!). These sunglasses are perfect. The frame isn't too large or too small, they are very light weight and feel of good quality. When I put them on, it was like putting on your favorite pair of jeans. It was very comfortable and I let out a sigh of relief. I had finally found a pair of sunglasses for me! I'm very happy with them. Also, I had a question regarding these glasses and the seller responded right away. They are very friendly and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Joy312

customer_reviews.title: They Float!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Wakesurfing. Last "aquatic" pair of sungalsses fell off and sunk within 3 min of being out on the water. These never had an issue. the frames are cool, lenses are high quality, and I brought them back after a day in the lake. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: After getting the wrong one from a 3rd party seller, that amazon snuck in on me, and the mess I am still dealing with them... I Still wanted a pair of these so I tried again and made sure that they were from the right seller. I got them and they were well worth everything I have got through to get a pair. These are so well made and light, it is just amazing what you can make with bamboo :). I wanted these for a cruise I am going on in a couple weeks and so happy I will have them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L. Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head for an adult. But these were narrow still. Polarization against glare was not as good as other glasses in the price range. Not a deal-breaker though. Lacquer had a strong smell when they first arrived, wore off in a week. I haven't tested the floating ability, but they are light weight. Not recommended for people with big heads or wide-set eyes.
customer_reviews.author: criminy

customer_reviews.title: For big heads
customer_reviews.text: Way too big, just fell right off my face. Very disappointed as they were really cool looking. I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Low feedback is temporary
customer_reviews.text: The item is as is described in the description. I am very happy about how the sunglasses work. The issue I have is the right hinge on temple as extra play and that results in the glasses not being held in place. I did send a note to the email within the box, but have not heard back. I do plan to up the overall rating in the future as soon as we are able to resolve this issue. Regards, Laxman
customer_reviews.author: Laxman R.

customer_reviews.title: Defective lenses
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and feel of these glasses, however I believe the lenses may defective. The lenses are mirrored on both the outside and inside, causing the sun to reflect back into your eyes. This is completely counter to reason for wearing sunglasses. Sunglasses are supposed to protect your eyes from harmful rays, not reflect them straight into your eye.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Son loves ‘em. Polarization is great!
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with these. And they really are polarized well. You can tell when looking into (Bahamas) ocean. Polarized glasses allow you to see farther down, and these were really nice. I put them on, and the visibility was comparable (almost) to my $200-300 glasses.
customer_reviews.author: C Kay

customer_reviews.title: Glare from glasses lens
customer_reviews.text: I have zero respect for companies that "buy" reviews. They offer a free pair of glasses for your Amazon review. The glasses themselves were stylish and they fit nice. But it didn't matter where I was wearing the glasses outside, there was a significant glare from the orange lenses in my peripheral vision that made them unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher hansen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shades
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed these during a lightning deal. I was skeptical about purchasing, but thought I'd give these a try. The glasses arrived today just before 2pm on a spectacular sunny day. I put them on and stepped outside and noticed a slight amber hue. These are excellent so far for bright days. IDK if they'd be good during blotted sunlight. However that what I have Carrera's for. Overall I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are made from a sustainable
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses fit very well, I love the way they look. That the frames are not plastic is awesome!!! I usually have a hard time getting sunglasses to fit properly since I need smaller frames to keep from sliding down my nose, these however fit perfectly. I now have three pair of these, the fit is perfect, and the glasses do not slide around even when sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Good product but the size was wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair from Woodies that I really like. They were the ones with wooden temples and black frame. I lost them while travelling. Now I ordered these and shipped them internationally; to Saudi Arabia where the sun resides! I ordered two of the ones that come in a pouch that I already had and two of the ones that come in the small wooden barrel (the above ones). The latter were smaller than I expected and I ended up not wearing them. I read once the supplier said all come at the same size; now that is not the case. You need to be careful about the size when you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Darweesh

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, blocks UVA/UVB rays, good-looking!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the cylindrical box I loved these. I got brown with dark brown lenses - cool! Bamboo is terrific instead of plastic or metal. I had MOHS surgery on bridge of nose, so wanted barely there, lightweight frame. Thanks for the creative marketing and quality.
customer_reviews.author: dianaskylark

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses look even better in person. And much lighter than I expected though the wood is real. I look forward to wearing these during future walks and runs around town. Hopefully, I'll be able to get my money's worth out of them since they're a snug yet comfy fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cludfield Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the overall feel of these sunglasses. They are very lightweight but feel solid when opening and while wearing them. The polarized lenses are a nice touch and do really cut down on the glare. The kit included wooden storage tube, a nice sized cloth to clean the lenses, a pull string storage bag and a string to attach to the ear pieces so you can hang them from your neck when you need to remove them. Compared to similar glasses these are a little higher priced so I am hopeful that they will last longer than the lower priced brands.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Mahler

customer_reviews.title: Solid good quality sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are solid, good sunglasses. The wood is thick and sturdy, good quality. The width of the frame is a little snug on my temples and I have an average width face. So I would not recommend for people with wider faces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holder

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Wooden Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. They are made of a high quality wood and are stylish. I was looking for a nice wood sunglasses and finally found them. Like that yhe glass is polarized to help while driving since I do a bunch of driving. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: E. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Woodies.  Who doesn't love Woodies.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality sunglasses for the money. Come in a very nice glasses case that is wooden along with a nice carrying bag and sunglass straps so you don't loose them. Overall I have no complaints and have gotten 2 compliments already today on them. Would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: icehouse419

customer_reviews.title: Quality and awesome style at an affordable price!!!
customer_reviews.text: So on a whim, I ordered these for my wife to match her new VW Beetle Convertible. SHE IS IN LOVE WITH THESE! She can't stop raving about these! Her new favorite 💙 sunglasses! Plus she also had to match her Chorkie Ace with his goggles!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sunglasses for my husband for our 5 year wedding anniversary, also known as the "wood" anniversary. They are lightweight but provide good sunprotection. The blue lenses are very reflective and look cool. Exactly like the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging great as present
customer_reviews.text: The wooden case of the glasses is of high quality, and with it also came a cloth case and a cleaning cloth for the sunglasses. The sunglasses are very light weight and build quality is good.I have gotten so many compliments, but the best part is that they are incredibly lightweight and comfortable. I love the wood finish
customer_reviews.author: katyB

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I've always just bought super cheap sunglasses, but these are worth the higher price tag. Besides being stylish (and non-plastic), they provide good sun protection and are surprisingly scratch-resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm happy with these glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are nice, light weight, stylish and appear to be built well. The lenses are truly polorized, clear and dark. Everything appears to be lining up great with these sunglasses but time is the true deciding factor so I will update my review if any changes occur within the upcoming few months.
customer_reviews.author: R.Rack

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely & looks great
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these because I liked the fist pair so much. I don’t like spending a lot of money on something I will loose on my next holiday but I’ve had these for about a year. I finally broke them hence why I’m getting a second New ones are a slightly different tint but still happy with them
customer_reviews.author: BeeBernal

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, stylish sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for an upcoming trip to California. I wanted something very light, but with all the benefits of a good pair of sunglasses. I have a thing for Bamboo, and when I saw these, it was the perfect choice. I've tried them out, and their ability to block out sun and glare are excellent. And my wife thinks they look good on me. Highly recommended for men and women.
customer_reviews.author: John Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, yet ready for Business or Casual
customer_reviews.text: I've received lots of compliments on these glasses as well as questions about where to get them. People love the wood grain look and assume they're heavyweight. To say they're lightweight is a compliment because they're certainly sturdy at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: DocK

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sunglasses, very cool on everyone and stayed on during exercise or play
customer_reviews.text: /Users/joannawalters/Desktop/IMG_2634 2.jpg /Users/joannawalters/Desktop/IMG_8784 2.JPG /Users/joannawalters/Desktop/IMG_9371.JPG Love these glasses. So cool. I love the size and the bold colors in the lens. You can see well through them. Crystal clear. Ive bought some other expensive brands in the past and they put a strain on my eyes after wearing for a while. These look great and I don have to keep removing them to let my eyes rest. I love them!! I want more in other colors. I think I'll try the red next. Im addicted to these fun glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Wayfarer style and lightweight - polarized no distortion lenses
customer_reviews.text: Had these bookmarked and was informed of a price drop so I decided to try them. I've given up on $100+ sunglasses - there are too many less expensive options. These are nice looking, seem well made and polarized lenses - absolutely key. Totally unisex styling - not at all huge on my face. I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Meadsup

customer_reviews.title: Very solid shades
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light construction, lenses are really polarized and the fit is standard. Would recommend to a friend. Reflection when hit with light is perfect and no one can see your eyes through the lenses unless it is dark out.
customer_reviews.author: Karla C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I usually never order sunglasses until i try it out , but i made an exception with this pair , and i couldn't be happier, they are perfect fit , lightweight , and super stylish , the quality is top notch! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Aviv

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, quality is fine, but they "look cheap."
customer_reviews.text: My wife immediate told me they looked cheap and I should send them back. Quality seemed ok, there was even a little give so they don't break. The build seemed sturdy. Really the appearance "looking cheap" is the only reason I will return.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pair for the ocean, and was going for low cost. But these are amazing. Absolutely the best sunglasses I've ever owned. Love the wood look and the green lenses. They really cut down on the glare too. Love'em.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parks

customer_reviews.title: I like em! These fit me really well
customer_reviews.text: I like em! These fit me really well. They look great! Especially the glass, when I wore them, they are not super dark unlike most shades, it has a orange tint to it and keeps the day pretty bright for clear vision. So I felt really fresh because of the brightness and I can still make eye contact with the sun comfortably so thats really interesting! I love them, I feel they are different from the many others. I also received compliments from my friends for the wooden shades look very unique and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses. Polarized. Very light. Bought for my 16yo son & he actually likes them! Be careful as they seem a bit less “sturdy” than molded plastic, but as long as u know that & plan accordingly. Nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel in OH

customer_reviews.title: Seriously comfortable and effective shades!
customer_reviews.text: These fantastic sunglasses came in the mail this morning...just in time for my lunchtime walk with my sweet girl! It is very bright outside today and is also the first day of spring, so with an extra spring in my step (see what I did there?), we took off. The shades are ridiculously comfortable (love the flexible hinges) and lightweight while taming ALL the sun glare like a beast!! Pretty sure they are also going to become my favorite shades for boating on the lake!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great lenses, Junior Sized
customer_reviews.text: These are well-made glasses, however, I have a small head and these are way too tiny for me. The lens is clearly superior to the $20 shades I bought and isn't too far from the $300 designer Italian shades, but if they are too small for my head, they will look like kids glasses on any average headed joe.
customer_reviews.author: Jing W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. I wear this just one time. they broke.
customer_reviews.author: xlau

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and very classy and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first pair of these sun glasses this summer for my nephew for his birthday then I purchased a second pair for my son in law to wear when they go in a cruise they are excellent quality and consistent with both pairs that I have purchased. I will be purchasing more as Christmas gifts they are excellent quality and a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Mylinda

customer_reviews.title: Spring loaded earpieces
customer_reviews.text: I like these sunglasses a lot (dark wood/rosewood lenses). They look great and are comfortable to wear. I don't really like the spring-back ear pieces though because they aren't tight enough when I put them on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight that i'd forget i had them on. Unfortunately for me, that led to their demise. These beautiful glasses fell from my shirt pocket while exiting a car and landed in the road. I found them the next day. One of the side pieces broke off and they suffered some significant frame damage from being run over. Somehow the lenses were still in perfect condition. Some glasses pinch the sides of my head or rest too hard on the ears. These are so incredibly comfortable. I will be replacing the pair i ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They float!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses float and that is kind of all I care about! I would probably not wear these as every day sunglasses. But they work for wearing out on the lake and I don't have to worry about losing a FOURTH pair.
customer_reviews.author: Elise C.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Makes everything blurry and yellow. I decided to keep them anyway but now wish I had returned them. Had them two months. Wore them maybe 10 times. Yesterday the right earpiece began to wobble. I tried to tightened screw. Next wearing,, the earpiece, hinge, and screw all fell off. What a waste of $35.
customer_reviews.author: KellyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Floaty
customer_reviews.text: I love how stylish these sunglasses look. I also read mixed reviews regarding whether or not they float, so I tested it myself on my sink, and they DO float, even if pushed down or treated roughly.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty alright
customer_reviews.text: These could be a little cheaper, however I do like them. They are light, look killer, and have decent functionality. I purchased 1 pair of shades and received them earlier than expected, then a day later received another pair I didn't pay for. Which is dope haha
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sunglasses. the construction is solid & they look better than they do in the pictures. the lenses are very dark, which I like. I also like the way that the arms have a flexible hinge it makes for a very comfortable fit. Overall a very good pair of sunglasses & a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luczynski

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased these sunglasses for my husband I was unsure if he was going to like them because it’s definitely something out of the ordinary for him but he seems to love them and he says he enjoys wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Maria Chico

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses---cool colors and design
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses--and I won't say, "for the money" as they're honestly just great sunglasses. Very comfortable and the optics seem pretty darn good. The frame size is good for my large dome.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful View!
customer_reviews.text: I originally brought these shades for my husband's birthday but I ended up taking them form him. I love the feel and lightness of the shades and I've received many compliments when I wear them. The clarity of the shades are amazing, I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLover

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these. They fit well, I just don’t like the look of the thick frame. The mirrored lens was thin and the color nice, but it’s also mirrored on the inside which seems to reflect back into my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Read all info before buying 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a little while now. I should have read through the description tho cuz plastic was not what I thought I'd be getting. I mean it feels like plastic. 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kassaundra

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunnies with a big WOW factor
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of comparisons before going with the Cloudfield model. They arrived today and I'm very pleased with my selection. They are light weight, fit exactly as stated in the description - and are very stylish. The company's follow-up after sale and customer support is excellent. I can highly recommend these with no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

product_meta.title: Wood Sunglasses Polarized for Men and Women - Bamboo Wooden Sunglasses Sunnies - Fishing Driving Golf
feature_bullets: birthday fathers day her rays light
✅ FORGET ABOUT BLINDING SUN LIGHT GLARE! - Water, snow, while driving or at the beach, our premium build quality wood sunglasses with polarized lenses will help you to see things in the best way!
✅ HANDMADE REAL WOOD SUNGLASSES THAT FIT! - Handcrafted from bamboo with a style that looks good on everyone, Cloudfield sunglasses will help you to stand out from the crowd! It is floating.

✅ KEEP YOUR EYES PROTECTED - 9-layer polarized lenses with a double UV blocking coating and polarizing film that make sure your eyes are fully protected against harmful ultraviolet (UV, UVA/UVB) rays!

✅ FREE BAMBOO PROTECTIVE CASE, MICROFIBER POUCH, and CLOTH - Each pair of Cloudfield sunglasses comes with a high-quality bamboo sunglasses case and pouch to protect your wood grain sunglasses and a microfiber cloth to keep them clean!
✅ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - The SIZE of new style sunglasses: Front frame 141mm, Arms 142mm, Height 45mm, Lens width 51mm, Lens height 41mm. *+/- 3mm.
